projects.title: SonnaLagoda
projects.description: Premium bedding e-commerce store with full-stack implementation.
projects.fullDescription: Premium bedding e-commerce store with full-stack implementation. Features include product catalog with filtering, shopping cart functionality, user authentication system, admin panel for content management, and order processing.

projects.title: VLC AI Translate
projects.description: CLI tool for translating subtitles using multiple translation providers.
projects.fullDescription: Command-line tool for translating subtitles using multiple AI and translation providers. Supports SRT and VTT formats.
